critique: The document outlines procedures for federal agencies to withhold income or employment taxes for the District of Columbia, states, and cities, based on agreements with the Treasury Secretary. It ensures consistency with existing laws and regulations, allowing agencies to rely on employee withholding certificates and member of the Armed Forces certificates of legal residence. The order also designates agency officers responsible for tax withholding and authorizes the Treasury Secretary to prescribe additional regulations. It revokes previous executive orders but maintains actions and agreements that are consistent with the new order.
